{{< fa brands twitter size=1.4xl >}} ivelasq3 | {{< fa brands linkedin size=1.4xl >}} ivelasq | {{< fa brands github size=1.4xl >}} ivelasq | {{< fa browser size=1.4xl >}} [ivelasq.rbind.io](https://ivelasq.rbind.io)





## Today's Agenda

-   Why create a blog?
-   Quarto recap
-   How to create a website with Quarto
-   How to create a blog with Quarto

::: {.callout-warning}

## Some assumptions for today

* You know a bit of R and R Markdown
* You know about Quarto and just need a refresher

:::

## How to participate

* Clone the GitHub repository and follow along on your computer: [link]
* Work in the RStudio Cloud project: [link]
* Just listen in

## Why create a blog?

It's time to share what you know!

### Collaboration

-   Share what you've learned
-   Write about your opinions
-   Give updates and news

### Communication

-   Practice writing
-   Create a portfolio of work
-   Centralization of information


::: {.cell}

quarto --help
## 
##   [1mUsage:[22m   [35mquarto[39m
##   [1mVersion:[22m [33m1.0.38
##            [39m

##     [34m-h[39m, [34m--help[39m     [31m[1m-[22m[39m Show this help.                            
##     [34m-V[39m, [34m--version[39m  [31m[1m-[22m[39m Show the version number for this program.

##   [1mCommands:[22m

##     [34mrender[39m          [33m[[39m[35minput[39m[33m][39m [33m[[39m[35margs...[39m[33m][39m   [31m[1m-[22m[39m Render input file(s) to various document types.            
##     [34mpreview[39m         [33m[[39m[35mfile[39m[33m][39m [33m[[39m[35margs...[39m[33m][39m    [31m[1m-[22m[39m Render and preview a document or website project.          
##     [34mserve[39m           [33m[[39m[35minput[39m[33m][39m             [31m[1m-[22m[39m Serve a Shiny interactive document.                        
##     [34mcreate-project[39m  [33m[[39m[35mdir[39m[33m][39m               [31m[1m-[22m[39m Create a project for rendering multiple documents          
##     [34mconvert[39m         [33m<[39m[35minput[39m[33m>[39m             [31m[1m-[22m[39m Convert documents to alternate representations.            
##     [34mpandoc[39m          [33m[[39m[35margs...[39m[33m][39m           [31m[1m-[22m[39m Run the version of Pandoc embedded within Quarto.          
##     [34mrun[39m             [33m[[39m[35mscript[39m[33m][39m [33m[[39m[35margs...[39m[33m][39m  [31m[1m-[22m[39m Run a TypeScript, R, Python, or Lua script.                
##     [34minstall[39m         [33m<[39m[35mtype[39m[33m>[39m [33m[[39m[35mtarget[39m[33m][39m     [31m[1m-[22m[39m Installs an extension or global dependency.

##     [34mhelp[39m            [33m[[39m[35mcommand[39m[33m][39m           [31m[1m-[22m[39m Show this help or the help of a sub-command.
